title: Episode #101 - Steve Simeone & ME
description: Stand-up Comic and Comedy store regular Steve Simeone hangs in the Mancave with me & talks about his new album "REMEMBER THIS", working at the Store, & we disect the pure genuis that is Bill Murray.
